items.title: A cavity emerges in Colgate’s earnings
items.description: The company’s sales declined by 4 percent in the June quarter, surprising investors. Whether this is a blip or a structural slowdown is the question

items.title: Zensar Q1 FY26: A quarter of good execution
items.description: The key market of the US, and the turnaround in the TMT vertical aided revenue

items.title: Supreme Court upholds Delhi HC's relief to SpiceJet over Kalanithi Maran's Rs 1,300 crore claim against the airline
items.description: Maran-owned KAL Airways had moved apex court seeking to challenge Delhi High Court’s order that had dismissed claim for damages against SpiceJet over a share transfer dispute.

items.title: PNB Housing Finance: Growth rebound story at a reasonable valuation
items.description: Growth-accretive expansion, resumption of corporate lending will drive scale, boost RoA

items.title: Mahindra Finance’s re-rating hinges on diversification strategy, steady credit cost
items.description: Cost tailwinds, better mix, and higher fee-based income to drive RoA

items.title: GNG Electronics IPO: Is it a good value proposition?
items.description: One-of-its-kind flotation that’s an interesting play on the refurbished electronics segment
